Name: Deadly Animal Duel
About the game: Deadly Animal Duel is a local multiplayer brawl game. Challenge a friend to a local duel and compare your video game skills or play single player mode and see how far your skills will get you! 4 deadly animals with different attacks and abilities carefully designed to bring violent amounts of mental pain to your opponent. 3 multiplayer levels, each causing different amount of frustration. Single player survival and time attack modes with furious bird boss fight. Joy, sorrow, and everything in between.
